DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics BCT194 psoriatic patient well understand skin penetration topically apply BCT194 .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Male patient post menopausal surgically sterile female patient age 18 75 year . Diagnosis stable plaque psoriasis ( without arthritis ) ; diagnose history psoriasis least 6 month prior screen Psoriatic plaque accessible microperfusion body site ( e.g . trunk ) convenient patient . Exclusion criterion : Currently nonplaque form psoriasis : erythrodermic , guttate , pustular . Currently druginduced psoriasis ( new onset exacerbation psoriasis beta blocker , calcium channel blocker , lithium ) . Recent previous treatment antiTNFÎ± therapy ( biological therapy ) , immunosuppressive agent cyclosporine , mycophenolate , pimecrolimus , tacrolimus . Current sign symptom severe , progressive , uncontrolled renal , hepatic , hematological , gastrointestinal , endocrine , pulmonary , cardiac , neurologic , cerebral , psychiatric , disease would make patient unsuitable trial . Presence major chronic inflammatory autoimmune disease like rheumatoid arthritis , spondyloarthropathy , inflammatory bowel disease systemic lupus erythematosus . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
